item.title: What are Private IP addresses
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: In the Internet addressing architecture, the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) and the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) have reserved various IP addresses for special purposes.

item.title: Enhance AWS S3 Data Security with Bucket Level Policy
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: After restricted the source of S3 Bucket access requests through Bucket Level Policy, the data in AWS S3 Bucket can still be secured even if AKSK is compromised.

item.title: Setup Kubernetes Cluster Using kubeadm
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: kubeadm performs the actions necessary to get a minimum viable cluster up and running.

item.title: DevOps CICD Pipeline in Action
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: There are differences in the most appropriate CICD pipelines in different environments, especially the toolchains, but the general process and thinking should be similar.

item.title: How to Generate Self-signed SSL Certificates

item.title: Why Use a Multi-Cloud Strategy
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: A multi-cloud strategy allows companies to select different cloud services from different providers.
